name: Masking My Fear
description: Originally started as part of a Halloween Game Jam, Masking My Fear is a Stealth-Puzzle Game based on the theme "Masks+Transformation". You play as a child stranded in a foreign world, who must collect 4 Masks - each with the power to transform the child's appearance - in order to return home, all without being seen my the strange creatures that inhabit each Zone (The Game currently lacks music, and will be updated when songs and SFX have been created)
